The implementation SelectedColorChanged event does not follow MS recommendations (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/w369ty8x.aspx).

I know that it's just a guideline, but I think one need s good reason not to follow it. Here is a discussion about it in stackoverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/104674/why-should-events-in-c-take-sender-eventargs

By the way, have you considered using a custom Routed Event (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms742806.aspx)?

thanks,

JP
